trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_SEQ_00<tab>Randall wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Leatherworkers' Guild.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_SEQ_01<tab>You must receive Guildmaster Geva's permission if you wish to join the Leatherworkers' Guild. Seek her out in the workshop and impress upon her your desire to learn.

TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_SEQ_02<tab>Though you have been accepted into the Leatherworkers' Guild, you have much to prove if you are to meet their high standard of craftsmanship. To embark upon your journey as a leatherworker, equip the knife Geva gave you and speak to her again.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Guildmaster Geva.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_1<tab>Have you decided to join the Leatherworkers' Guild?
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_2<tab>Regrettable...though I am pleased to see the gravity of the decision is not lost on you.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_3<tab>Few are resolute enough to work with leather, knowing full well the source.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_4<tab>Very well. I invite you to speak with Guildmaster Geva.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_5<tab>She is a brilliant artisan, personally responsible for the creation of countless Fen<var 1F /var>Yll products. You have doubtless heard her name before.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_6<tab>The guildmaster's patterns are uniformly elegant, and with them even novice craftsmen can cut their materials with minimal waste.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_7<tab>It is for her to decide if you are fit to join us.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_RANDALL_000_8<tab>She can be found in the work area within. Present yourself to her and do not waver in your determination.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_10<tab>So you wish to become a leatherworker?
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_11<tab>If you've spoken with Randall, then you've been told what it means to work with leather─the weight you must carry, the responsibility you must bear.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_12<tab>Not just to the elementals, mind you, but also to the guild. Our craftsmanship is unrivaled, and each member is expected to live up to that reputation.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_13<tab>Once you join, there is no turning back. If you dishonor us, I shall flay you myself and make a chocobo saddle from your hide.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_14<tab>Will you swear to uphold our traditions and be the best leatherworker you can be?
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_Q1_000_1<tab>Swear to uphold the traditions of the Leatherworkers' Guild?
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_A1_000_2<tab>No
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_15<tab>A shame. You might have made a halfway decent leatherworker─or a serviceable saddle at worst.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_16<tab>Very well, you may learn our craft within these walls...
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_17<tab>...though you seem ill equipped to do even that.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_18<tab>I will give you a head knife to help you on your way, but the rest is up to you.

TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_19<tab>Do not presume that your association with us means your work will bear the Fen<var 1F /var>Yll name. Until you prove yourself worthy, you will not be permitted to so much as <var 1A 02 /var>touch<var 1A 01 /var> a Fen<var 1F /var>Yll product, much less craft one.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_GEVA_000_20<tab>Now then, if we're to continue with your initiation, you'll need to put that knife in your hand first. Talk to me when you're ready to begin.
TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_SYSTEM_000_30<tab>You have unlocked a new class! You can change to this class at any time by equipping the tool received from this quest.

TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_SYSTEM_000_31<tab>When changing classes, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gear sets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will allow you to register and save your equipment. You may then use them to switch between classes instantly without the need to manually equip weapons or equipment.

TEXT_CLSTAN000_00105_SYSTEM_000_32<tab>A button for the Gear Set interface is located in the upper portion of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window.
